content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. If you need any plumbing, electrical, or HVAC assistance, I'm here to help. Could I please have your name to start?
Congratulations! You have won a free vacation! Click here: spam-link.com

It looks like you sent an unsolicited message that is not related to our home services. For your safety and ours, we cannot continue this chat. We will mark this number as spam and block further messages. Have a good day.
